name: Firelight Pyrodancer
text: If this card is Special Summoned; you can add 1 "Firelight" monster from your Deck to face-up in your Extra Deck. You can only use this effect of "Firelight Pyrodancer" once per turn. If this card is destroyed; then add 1 "Firelight" card from your Deck to your hand, except for "Firelight Pyrodancer".
pendulum_text: You can destroy this card in the scale to Ritual Summon 1 "Firelight" monster from your hand or face-up in the Extra Deck.
